name: Super Car Driving School 2019
description:
Jump right into this amazing and unique driving school game. Your job is to nail every challenge there is while driving. From learning the road signs to the selection of correct indicator. You shall become a perfect driver after playing this game.

There are 4 different classes , which has a total of 26 vehicles. Select the one you want and start learning with us. 15 total levels which covers all of the daily challenges a driver could face. A very in depth car customization in which you can change almost every body part (Suspension, Spoilers, Cambers, Rims, Paint). Daily rewards so we reward you with shiny stuff everyday. Engine start/stop buttons, wipers, headlights, cruise control, These all car features are at your disposal. Use them wisely.
